Author: ecowaterair.io
Title: [preICO] EcoWaterAir (EWA) - ICO Innovative systems conditioning
Body: When talking about our EWA project, we often focuses on the fact that EWA conditioning system does not use Freon. Why is it so important? Why we use water instead of Freon and it adds great benefit to our conditioners? Freon has a number of features, which used to ensure him leading rates in the conditioning market: it is chemically inert, inflammable, explosion-proof, high heat-resistant and low toxic. But when Freon is applied to high temperatures (for example, in hot countries), it gets different: Freon contact with hot surfaces leads to its decomposition and chloride and fluoride hydrogen release, that cause mucous membrane irritation. One more Freon decomposition product is poisonous gas called Phosgene. It is dangerous for human health and life. EWA conditioner performance is not based on the Freon, that`s why it works perfect at high temperatures (up to 90°C), without any harmful substance, noise or vibration release – only 100% pure and fresh cooled air. Read more info on our innovative project onto the site http://ecowaterair.io/eng

Title: [preICO] EcoWaterAir (EWA) - ICO Innovative systems conditioning
Body: The EWA project is a unique development of a technology of production of environmentally friendly freon-free air conditioning system of the future.  Within our project we aim to reduce electricity consumption of air conditioning systems worldwide, to develop techniques of industrial applications of machine intelligence and neural networks in the production process and to completely eliminate the harm to human health from the use of air conditioners. Since the products developed by us within the frameworks of the project EWA have no analogues on the market it will arouse great interest on the part of consumers. This will lead to an increase in the capitalization of EWA and, therefore, to an increase of the value of the token EWAcoin. Find out more about our eco-friendly innovative project on the website http://ecowaterair.io/eng

Author: ecowaterair.io
Title: [preICO] EcoWaterAir (EWA) - ICO Innovative systems conditioning
Body: Today it is difficult to imagine our life without air conditioning – in summer it cools the air and provides us with the necessary fresh air, in winter it warms and gives us comfort. However, the technology with freon used as a refrigerant in air-conditioning is not as safe for human health, as it may seem at first glance. While cooling air, freon air conditioning extracts about 1 litre of water per hour, thus draining the air. Dry air has a negative effect on the mucous membranes of the respiratory tract and on human skin. Dryness of mucous membranes, moreover, may result in easy getting into the body of viruses and infections. Do not forget that the specific gravity of freon is heavier than the specific gravity of air, so if there is a leak it can expel the air from the room. Some types of freon during decomposition emit dangerous toxins that cause suffocation and drowsiness. Innovative air conditioning EWA which uses plain water instead of freon is environmentally friendly and completely safe for human health. You can find detailed information about it in the White Paper of the project EWA on our website http://ecowaterair.io/eng

Author: Princess04ka
Title: [preICO] EcoWaterAir (EWA) - ICO Innovative systems conditioning
Body: ecowaterair.io     FEATURES of ICO PROJECT  Rights of real stockholders Token holders take part in making company decisions. Data on stockholders is stored in a Smart contract.  Voting of stockholder Part of decisions will be made by voting of participants.  Smart contracts For automatic distribution of dividends to wallets of participants.  Anonymity Anonymity  Safety Blockchain cannot be hacked, and information inside it cannot be changed.   TYPES OF EWA CONDITIONERS    A unit model is selected individually, based on technical specifications and climatic conditions. At the request of the customer it can be supplemented by hot-air heating plant of own production, any types of air filters, air handling units.  Advanced automatic equipment provides optimum performance at given parameters. Cooled and cleaned air is usually delivered through an air-ducting system. EWA module structure enables to solve tasks to get cold of any volumes.  A model series of EWA air conditioners have configurations, which are intended for usage in passenger compartments, and also separate heat-exchanger blocks built into air handling units, central air conditioners and air cooling units.   COUNTRIES    Get 50% bonus to purchased tokens!  More efficient bonus will not be available even on ICO. Do it now, before the offer is over. The minimum amount for participation is 2 ETH  SUPPORT   ADVANTAGES OF UNIQUE EWA AIR CONDITIONER  Reduces energy consumption up to 10 times. Reduces expenses for service maintenance and repair up to 10 times. Reduces water consumption up to 50%, compared to other evaporative systems.  Performs ventilation functions. Easily manages increased temperatures, up to +90°C. Which is often impossible for other types of conditioning. No compressor noise and vibration.  Implementation into a central air conditioner reduces its power consumption up to 2-5 times. Implementation into a ventilation system adds a cooling function, without increasing electricity consumption. Perfect reliability due to simplicity of design.  Doesn’t exceed the average cost of Freon equipment of the same capacity. Can function in conjunction with Freon equipment, expanding technical capabilities of the system and minimizing costs.  Absolutely environmentally friendly and safe! Doesn’t dry out or over moisten air, keeps natural humidity. Provides constant 100% fresh air supply. Able to function directly from solar batteries.   DESCRIPTION OF TECHNOLOGY     White Paper  EcoWaterAir – from an idea in 2002 to actual production in 2015     Investments in real assets  The increase of sales volume and opening of new market outlets will lead to increase in demand for EWAcoin. The amount of air conditioning system consumers is growing every year. A revolutionary system of unique EWA air conditioners doesn’t have analogues in the world. There are no similar products to EWA in the total volume of air conditioner market, which are environmentally friendly and harmless for human health.  Investments in a finished product, which passed the test of time and load. EWA is not an idea, this is already operating assembly line (manual) and everyone who bought a token gets an opportunity to gain profit all the time or get non-recurring income.  Increase of profitability is expected due to reduction of costs, by the implementation of machine intelligence, which results in complete automation of technical and production processes.   ICO DETAILS     BONUSES     ICO STRUCTURE     Get 50% bonus to purchased tokens!  More efficient bonus will not be available even on ICO. Do it now, before the offer is over. The minimum amount for participation is 2 ETH  SUPPORT    Project team        Experience and achievements  At the moment in the sphere of cooling systems EWA cooperates with the following companies:  — Latvian railways — Vodafone communications service provider — BP Global company — Latvenergo power supply company — Riga railway car building works — Latvia gas company — Communication company Lattelecom  Development types have been created and a batch production of finished products has been launched.  Total capacity of issued EWA air conditioners makes 210,000 mW/h of cooling capacity.  EWA air conditioners have been in successful operation in 7 European and Asian countries by this day. Title: [preICO] EcoWaterAir (EWA) - ICO Innovative systems conditioning
Body: What distinguishes the ICO of our EWA project from the ICO of other projects?  While developing the EWA project and putting it on the ICO, we tried to give our investors maximum opportunities and privileges. Holders of EWAcoin tokens will be able to participate in the development of the project on the rights of real shareholders. Data on the company's shareholders will be fixed by a smart contract. Using blockchain technology to commit transactions ensures that all participants in the project are anonymous and secure - blockchain can not be hacked, only reliable public information will always be stored in it. http://ecowaterair.io/eng

Author: ecowaterair.io
Title: [preICO] EcoWaterAir (EWA) - ICO Innovative systems conditioning
Body: Why are we confident of the success of the EWA project?  The EWA air conditioner is a completely unique development that allows using water instead of freon for air cooling. This technology will allow you to reduce the level of electricity consumption, as well as the cost of repairs and maintenance. In comparison with other evaporative systems, the EWA air conditioner will need 50% less water for operation. Along with the air cooling function, the EWA air conditioners also have a ventilation function. In addition, they are able to work in conditions of high temperatures (up to 90 ° C), in which other conditioners, as a rule, simply are not able to function. Important point: EWA air conditioners are noiseless in operation, vibration from the compressor is absent. Another undeniable advantage of the EWA air conditioner is its rather low cost (the price of an air conditioner is comparable to the average cost of an air conditioner of similar capacity using freon in its work). It can be used either separately or in conjunction with any freon equipment. And most importantly - the EWA air conditioner is absolutely ecological and safe! It does not over-moisten the air and does not dry it, maintaining the humidity in the room at a natural level. The air conditioner provides a constant supply of fresh air and can be operated from solar panels directly. Learn more about EWA air conditioners and our project at http://ecowaterair.io/eng

Author: ecowaterair.io
Title: [preICO] EcoWaterAir (EWA) - ICO Innovative systems conditioning
Body: Did you know that countries with a hot climate spend 70-80% of the total electricity consumption for air conditioning?  Saudi Arabia, for example, spends about 160 billion kW per year cooling the premises, and this indicator is steadily growing - by 2030 it should double. Therefore, technologies that reduce energy consumption for cooling air are in great demand and bring great benefits to their developers. The EWA project will significantly reduce the energy required for air conditioning. A unique air conditioning system, developed by the project, dispenses with refrigerant-in this case ordinary water is used. Realization of the project will bring profit to its investors and creators in the shortest possible time. http://ecowaterair.io/eng

Author: Ck1234
Title: [preICO] EcoWaterAir (EWA) - ICO Innovative systems conditioning
Body: It looks like you guys manufacture air conditioners and that's a great business to be in, but with that business model why would you need to incorporate a cryptocurrency?  It seems like once you cash out the ethereum from your token sale, the value of the token itself would be secondary.  Meaning there would be minimal incentive to maintain the token price.  And then all of the team could just unload the tokens in only 1 year time.  You guys aren't even vested into your own project....that's weird.  My question then is: What exactly is the utility of the token? It sounds like fund raising only.... and then dump?
